inputs.research_context: We will collect de-identified demographic, clinical, and MRI imaging data (structural MRI, fMRI, and 1H fMRS) from 110 affected youth and 110 matched healthy controls. Data needed to create a global unique identifier for the NIMH Data Archive (NDA) will also be collected.
inputs.data_types: Tabular demographic/clinical data and MRI imaging data (structural MRI, fMRI, 1H fMRS), plus derived measures and documentation (data dictionaries, protocols, README).
inputs.data_source: Human research participants under an approved protocol; MRI acquired using standardized scan protocols and clinical/demographic measures collected via study instruments and study databases.
inputs.consent_status: Participants will provide consent for broad data sharing.
inputs.data_volume: Data for 220 participants including tabular measures and multi-modal MRI imaging files; imaging data will comprise the largest share.
